text:
Every Game of Thrones fan knows that there are several deaths that happen and are waiting for more to come in the ongoing Season 8. For all GoT addicts, who have always wanted to know the exact death toll of the show till now, IMDB has an answer now.
HBO
IMBD has compiled a list of individual deaths shown in the series, by beheading, poisoning and other macabre ways of killing people. So, as per IMDB, the death toll on the show totals to 1211 in 67 episodes of the show's seven seasons.
IMDB also compiled some numbers and they also concluded the most expensive episode so far, which was the Battle of Bastards from the 6th season.
Don't Miss 159 SHARES 842 SHARES
Warner Bros
Just to jog your memory a little, it was the episode when Jon Snow has a face-off with Ramsay Bolton on the fields of Winterfell. The episode approximately costed $11 million (over Rs 76 crore). However, several reports claim that the upcoming episodes of season 8 might have expensive episode coming up at $15 million.
If we talk about death toll, here are some of the episodes that had maximum number of deaths.
1. The number of deaths by poisoning = 51
2. Number o deaths by fire= 83 people
3. Number of people killed by beheading= 13
title: Game of Thrones' Death Toll Totals Up To 1211 In 67 Episodes From 7 Seasons!
description: Every Game of Throne Fan knows that there are several death that happens and wait! There's more to come in the ongoing Season 8. For all GoT plans who have always wanted to know the exact death toll of the show till now, IMDB has an answer now. Read more here.
